name: react-auth-jwt
description: • As a user, I want to sign up so that I can create an account and store my posts. • As a user, I want to create a new post with a title. • As a user, I want to view my posts and see their details. • As a user, I want to edit my posts • As a user, I want to delete my post if I no longer need it. • As a user, I want to comment on a post to leave feedback or ask questions. • As a user, I want to delete or update my comment after posting it • As a guest user, I can only view posts but not edit or create any data.
